name: 迷走都市
summary: Another classic love-sim game from the original JAST, Runaway City tells the story of Hiroaki, a boy with a mysterious power of Good Luck. It's almost as it some power makes women do whatever he wants. At first it's a great power to have, then as time goes by it scares him more and more. Unchecked, this power will be the destruction of all Japan. Can you find out the nature of your power and find a way to stop it before it goes too far?
info:
• 中文名: 迷走都市
  • 别名: Runaway City
  • 平台: PC98 DOS PC
  • 游戏类型: AVG
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 1995-12-22
